edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog

  • public class CourseCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a course catalog that is empty. The user may load a file into catalog, add a course, remove course, or save the catalog. The courses in catalog are ordered by name and section. There may be multiple sections of the same course, but a course/section pair must be unique.
    Author:
    jhnguye4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CourseCatalog()
      This is the constructor method which takes in no parameters and will create an empty Sorted list array.

    • Method Detail

      • newCourseCatalog

        public void newCourseCatalog()
        This method is used to create a new course catalog that is a Sorted list array.

      • loadCoursesFromFile

        public void loadCoursesFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method is used to load courses into the catalog field. It does this by calling upon the readCourseRecords method in CourseRecordsIO. The parameter inputed is the file name the user wants to load, if the file does not exist then it will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file containing list of courses
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file selected could not be read.

      • addCourseToCatalog

        public boolean addCourseToCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String section,
                                  int credits,
                                  java.lang.String instructorId,
                                  int enrollmentCap,
                                  java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Adds a course to the catalog. Returns true if the course is added and false if the course is unable to be added because their name/section matches another course's name and section. This method has all the parameters of a Course
        Parameters:
        name - name of the course
        title - title of course
        section - course section number
        credits - number of credits for the course
        instructorId - Id of the instructor
        enrollmentCap - is the capacity of class
        meetingDays - days that courses meet
        startTime - courses startTime.
        endTime - courses endTime.
        Returns:
        true if student is able to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if course being added already exists in the catalog.

      • addCourseToCatalog

        public boolean addCourseToCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String section,
                                  int credits,
                                  java.lang.String instructorId,
                                  int enrollmentCap,
                                  java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Adds a course to the catalog. Returns true if the course is added and false if the course is unable to be added because their name/section matches another course's name and section. This method has all the parameters of a Course except the startTime and endTime since the users meetingDays was "A"
        Parameters:
        name - name of the course
        title - title of course
        section - course section number
        credits - number of credits for the course
        instructorId - Id of the instructor
        enrollmentCap - is the capacity of the course
        meetingDays - days that courses meet
        Returns:
        true if student is able to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if course being added already exists in the catalog.

      • removeCourseFromCatalog

        public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String section)
        Removes the course with the given name and section from the list of courses in the catalog. Returns true if the course is removed and false if the student is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        name - Removing the course which has this name
        section - Removing the course which has this section
        Returns:
        true if Course can be removed from directory

      • getCourseFromCatalog

        public Course getCourseFromCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section)
        This method gets course from catalog if the name and section match, if not it will return null
        Parameters:
        name - parameter that is compared to name of Course object in catalog
        section - parameter that is compared to section of Course object in catalog
        Returns:
        Course if the name and section matches name and section of course in catalog

      • getCourseCatalog

        public java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
        Creates a 2D array of the class name, section, and title of all classes in catalog
        Returns:
        String[][] array with the course name, section, title, and meetingDays

      • saveCourseCatalog

        public void saveCourseCatalog(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates output file of students schedule
        Parameters:
        fileName - String of name that is on output file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when file cant be created
